item.description:
Please join us for awesome movie night! Movie Nights will be held once a month (4th Sunday of the month) where we will watch cultural/educational movies in a fun/social setting.

Popcorn and some beverages and snacks will be provided by the club, but everyone is welcome to bring additional snacks to share!

Movie: The Final Inch
"Nearly 50 years after a vaccine for Polio was developed in the United States, the Polio virus still finds refuge in some of the world's most vulnerable places. Into India's impoverished neighborhoods, The Final Inch follows the massive—and yet highly personalized—mission to eradicate Polio from the planet. One of history's most feared diseases, now largely forgotten, Polio has become a disease of the world's poor."

We will also be holding our quarterly induction celebration so please join us to congratulate our newest members!
item.how_to_find_us: Follow signs for Boston Rotaract to the Trustee Reading Room!

group.name: Boston Rotaract - A Service/Social Club for 18-30 Yr Olds

item.name: Movie Night and Induction
